document_data.name: Alastrarra
document_data.mainbody: '''Alastrarra''' was the name of an elven house of [[Cormanthyr]]. Their symbol was a [[falcon]].
document_data.History: Alastrarra was reckoned as a first house of Cormanthyr and possessed a ''[[tel'kiira]]'' that was black with memories. They were rivals of House [[Starym]].
document_data.Members:
* Lady Speaker [[Namyriitha Alastrarra]], matriarch and mother of Iymbryl
* [[Ornthalas Alastrarra]], third son and heir of Namyriitha and brother to Iymbryl
* [[Naeryndam Alastrarra]], half-brother and elder sibling of Namyriitha
* [[Iymbryl Alastrarra]], Mage of Many Gems. Killed in [[241 DR]] by [[hobgoblins]] while on patrol.{{cite book/Elminster in Myth Drannor|45-56}}
* [[Ayaeqlarune]], wife to Iymbryl
* [[Riluaneth]], cousin, slain by [[Elminster]] in the guise of Iymbryl.
* [[Filaurel Alastrarra]], sister of Iymbryl
* [[Melarue Alastrarra]], sister of Iymbryl
* [[Sheedra Alastrarra]], mother of Nanthleene
* [[Nanthleene Alastrarra]]
* [[Thurruvyn]], ancestor
